entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Wiarton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:55 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.4°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

Dewpoint: -3.9°C

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
